    • Method Detail

      • executeScript

        public byte[] executeScript(java.lang.String scriptName,
                            NCMBScript.MethodType method,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> header,
                            org.json.JSONObject body,
                            org.json.JSONObject query,
                            java.lang.String baseUrl)
                     throws NCMBException
        execute script to NIFCLOUD mobile backend
        Parameters:
        scriptName - script name
        method - HTTP method
        header - header data
        body - content data
        query - query params
        baseUrl - script base url
        Returns:
        Result to script
        Throws:
        NCMBException - exception from NIFCLOUD mobile backend

      • executeScriptInBackground

        public void executeScriptInBackground(java.lang.String scriptName,
                                      NCMBScript.MethodType method,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> header,
                                      org.json.JSONObject body,
                                      org.json.JSONObject query,
                                      java.lang.String baseUrl,
                                      ExecuteScriptCallback callback)
        execute script to NIFCLOUD mobile backend in background thread
        Parameters:
        scriptName - script name
        method - HTTP method
        header - header
        body - content data
        query - query params
        baseUrl - script base url
        callback - callback for after script execute
